amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: State College Facilities Program of 2006; created; use of appropriations.
amendatorysection.para: The State College Facilities Program of 2006 is created. All funds appropriated to the program by the Legislature shall be used exclusively for deferred maintenance, repair, and renovation projects authorized pursuant to section 85-424.
